posts.post_title: $OLD - A T205 2 card lot both Polar Bear
posts.post_content: $OLD - A T205 2 card lot of John Rowan SGC 3 and John Titus SGC 2.5 .  Price includes shipping, please message if interested and thanks for looking.  Bob I.  Note: NC residents please add 6.5% ST.
